text: (ayinum,) avarkalil evarkal nampikkai kontu, narceyalkalaic ceytu, (tankal kavitaikalil) allahvai atikamaka ninaivu ceytu (pirar mulam) aniyayattirku ullanatan pinnar, pali vankinarkalo avarkalait tavira (marravarkal kurravalikaltan. Pirarai tunpuruttiya) aniyayakkararkal tankal enku tirumpac cella ventumenpatai aticikkirattil arintu kolvarkal
